page.title: 04Education cont
page.content: There are 104 children taught by 2 full-time and 3 part-time teachersand 1 head teacher in 4 teaching groups.There is also a secretary, general assistant, caretaker.Parents also assist.All pupils eat lunch at school. Half eat school lunch,the rest packed food.The school meal costs 65p, a choice of food is available. 3 Supervisors care for the children during the lunch break. The Governing Body meets at least once per term and consists of Foundation Governors, representatives of the local education authority and the minor authority, parents, teachers and the head teacher. The Parent-Teacher Association meets at least once per term and organises events to raise money for additional items for school use( as much as one third of expenditure) over that provided.
